page.title: 04SPORT IN MARSDEN
page.content: { { Marsden under 12 football team has played 26 other teams.They have won 8 of these,lost 12 and drawn 6. There are two football fields in Marsden.One of these is on Fall Lane and the other football field is at Netherly.There is also a cricket field,tennis court and golf club at Netherley.They are building a Sports Hall in part of the old mill that burnt down on Fall Lane.A lot of people go to the park to play bowls,and there are two tennis courts in the park as well. {David Carter and Matthew Sykes June {1985
